name: 10,001 - A space exploration game
description:
Follow me

twitter | twitch | youtube | reddit | instagram | itch.io

Ludum Dare 48 submission - Theme for the game jam was "Deeper and deeper"

*Best if played in fullscreen on a monitor with 1080p resolution.

10,001 A space exploration game

Explore a universe and discover landmark locations. Watch out for Xenosites and eliminate them before they can destroy your ship.

There is no win objective in this game. Enjoy exploring while taking in the atmospheric mood. If you get lost check out the coordinates I provided below in the spoiler section to check out some of the locations.

Controls
  • W, S - Increase and decrease thrust
  • A, D - Turn your ship left and right
  • Mouse Left Click - Fire machine gun
  • Mouse Move - Aim in the direction of your crosshair
Spoilers Below

Do not read if you want to find hidden secrets on your own.

Head to these coordinates for landmark locations to check out in game.

  • -312.13, 161.77
  • -314.87, 163.06
  • -315.46, 160.72
  • -313.69, 160.72
